remarks: Functionality and domain of the permutation sign function.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 28-Aug-2015.)
statement:
psgnfn.g $e |- G = ( SymGrp ` D ) $.
psgnfn.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
psgnfn.f $e |- F = { p e. B | dom ( p \ _I ) e. Fin } $.
psgnfn.n $e |- N = ( pmSgn ` D ) $.
psgnfn $p |- N Fn F $.
$d B p $.
